Here is the new Fossil HR hybrid smartwatch: display always on, notifications but no GPS and Google Pay (photo)
06 Nov 2019, 15:48 by Vincenzo Ronca
Fossil broke the delay on his new hybrid smartwatch, which is available for pre-order in the US market. The new Fossil HR is a good combination of the smart side and the classic side of watches.
You can see the design of the new Fossil HR through the images shown in the gallery: the display is always on and shows the main information on weather, notification and tracked physical activity, it is placed behind the classic hands that indicate the time. The new Fossil hybrid does not have Wear OS as a software base, but a simplified operating system developed internally. Furthermore, we do not find the support of GPS and Google Pay for digital payments.
However, the new Fossil HR offers the possibility of managing music reproduction and has a battery capacity of 55 mAh. The smartwatch is pre-ordered in the US market at a price equivalent to around â‚¬ 175. We do not know when it is expected to arrive in European markets.
